text: "Here I Am (Come and Take Me)" is a 1973 song by Al Green and is the second single from his sixth studio album Call Me. It went to number 10 in the United States. ==UB40 version== In 1990 British band UB40 covered Here I Am (Come and Take Me) for their ninth studio album Labour of Love II. It went to number 46 in the United Kingdom and had much better success in the United States, the Netherlands, New Zealand and Australia where it made the top 10 in these countries. ==References== Category:1973 songs Category:Soul songs Category:Al Green songs Category:UB40 songs Category:Michael Jackson songs Category:Seal songs Category:Etta James songs
title: Here I Am (Come and Take Me)
